abilities.description: Your crew member has a specific role aboard your command vehicle. When you make a move directly aided by their expertise, reroll your action die if its value is less than your crew member's health. If you then score a strong hit with a match, mark 1 tick on your bonds legacy track.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.13b2d777c6fb719d]{Gather Information} by conferencing with your crew member, add +1 for each crew member present (up to +4). On a miss, envision how friction arises between crew members.

When your crew member is at full health and you score a miss with a match while they are present, you may set their health to 0 and mark them as out of action. If you do, treat the miss with a match as a strong hit.
